word: Let the unction from the Holy One pervade your whole being, and you will bear the impress of Christ. This is an armor that is proof against all the arrows of Satan. The safety of the messengers of truth is found in their possession of the meekness and lowliness of Christ. Jesus said, "In this rejoice not, that the spirits are subject unto you; but rather rejoice, because your names are written in heaven." The prize of our high calling should be kept continually before us. As we look unto Jesus, self will sink into insignificance.
